participant_1.background:
I enjoy the fresh taste of my home-grown vegetables.
i like crocheting.
my favorite band is imagine dragons.
I start my morning with a walk around the neighborhood to get some fresh air and see what's going on at the local shops.
i have survived near death experiences.

participant_2.background:
I love going on long bike rides in the woods, but I don't tell my parents because they worry about me getting hurt.
i have been married five times.
i escaped and later became a carpenter.
sometimes i go to yoga classes.
I'm looking for a home with a large closet so I can have plenty of space for my sewing supplies.

content.text: Hey, I'm going for a walk around the neighborhood, do you want to come?
No, it's too cold and I have to sew. I'm getting ready to sell some of my handmade items at a local craft fair.
Oh I love crafts! What kinds of things do you make?
Mostly quilts, but I also do some crocheting and cross stitch.
Wow, that's impressive! I crochet too, but I'm not very good at it.
Don't worry, it takes time to get good at it. I've been crocheting for years.
What's your favorite thing to crochet?
I love making blankets. They're so warm and cozy.
I bet they are. I've always wanted to make a blanket, but I've never had the time.
You should give it a try! It's really easy to learn and it's a great way to relax.
I'll think about it. Thanks for the advice!
No problem! Have fun on your walk!
